library(tidyverse)

## Question 1

Import data by listing out all path names and using `map` to grab observations for each path.
```{r}
df <-
  tibble(
    files = list.files("data"),
    path = str_c("data/", files)
  ) %>%
  mutate(data = map(path, read_csv)) %>%
  unnest()
```
